title: Subdivision & Land Development Plans Review
image-alt: screen shot of a web map app
teaser: Custom developed web map that allows querying subdivision/land development plans by date.

title: Yellow Breeches Water Trail Story Map
image-alt: screen shot of a web map app
teaser: An Esri Classic Story Map Tour app that has been enhanced using custom JavaScript.  Enhancements include a toggable map legend and adding alt text attributes to all images.

title: Find Nearby Pennsylvania Parks
image-alt: screen shot of a web map app
teaser: An app that locates Pennsylvania local parks near the user's current location.  Built with Leaflet.js, ArcGIS Rest JS, Parcel.js, and the Geolocation API.
